content: Tom only went to Mary's house to work on some homework together, but as a storm was raging outside his parents decided to let him spend the night there.
translations: ita:Tom andò a casa di Mary solamente per fare dei compiti insieme, ma, dato che fuori infuriava una tempesta, i suoi genito
